sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './App.css' import {io} from 'socket.io-client' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' const socket = io.connect("http://localhost:3001") function UserContent() { const location = useLocation() const [player, setPlayer] = useState("") const [team, setTeam] = useState("") const [c_team, setCTeam] = useState("") const [c_amount, setCAmount] = useState("0") let bp let newBidAmount, basePrice; const handleBid = () =>{ var val = document.getElementById('bid-amount') val.value =val.value + 10 // setCAmount(newBidAmount) setCTeam(team) console.log("After "+c_amount); socket.emit("handle_bid",{team, amount:c_amount}) } useEffect(()=>{ socket.emit("req_player") socket.on("requested_player",(data)=>{ // console.log("hey "+data.player); setPlayer(data.player) setTeam(location.state) // setCAmount(0) // setCTeam("") basePrice =Number(player["Base_Price_Lakhs"]); }) socket.on("reply_handle_bid", (data)=>{ setCTeam(data.team) setCAmount(data.amount) }) },[socket]) return (

User Content

Timer: 00:00

Player Name: {player["First_Name"]+" "+player["Surname"]}

Player Stats

Stats: Stats Here

Auction Details

Base Price:

Current Bid: |

Slots Players Over.
Batsman 5 2
Bowler 7 3
All Rounder 4 2
WK 2 1
) } export default UserContent
